channel.title: Problem with my server
channel.description:
every time i make some1 member by usin ::membership (username) after they log out they lose it. I have they agueas pkz source so there is another to get member is by trading louie legs but it still does the same thing and it doesnt even make them member if they trade him
im guessing here(new with coding), but if i wanted to fix the louie prob would i go into npc handler and play around with him

item.title: Problem with my server
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

No actually, you need to save the membership status with the saveinfo() and savemoreinfo() (if it exists) method, you need to edit that. Also, load it with the loadinfo() and loadmoreinfo() method. This way when the player logs out, his membership status will be saved and when he logs in it will be loaded. If you need me to make the code for you just say so.

Read full topic
